website_summaries.verdict: A quality swimsuit from a well-known brand that's great for girls who need a racing-style suit.
pros: Lightweight one-piece suit comes in nine different colors and in sizes 7 to 16
Fabric is chlorine-resistant, so colors don't fade
Made of quality materials that hold up to regular use
cons: Tends to run small compared to typical girls' swimsuit sizes

customer_reviews.title: AS LONG AS YOU KNOW IT RUNS SMALL
customer_reviews.text: This suit is great, as long as you know that it runs small. I didn't want the straps falling down (etc) for swimming lessons so we bought this... her first decent suit. My daughter is 6, but is one of the bigger kids in her class. She's 42" tall and 55#. She wears 7/8 shirts and size 8 (never slim) jeans. We bought this suit in a size 10, and it's perfect. Eaay for her to get on, and only a TINY bit baggy in the hips. But certainly nothing that bothers her. Covers her rear end well/fully & doesn't ride up.
customer_reviews.author: Jess K

customer_reviews.title: Great Suit!
customer_reviews.text: Be mindful when you order the size. Speedo runs a little differently than other swimsuits. My daughter is just transitioning into a 7/8 in regular clothes at Target now and she semi-fits into the same size bathing suits (gotta tweak the straps normally), but she wears a size 10 in Speedo. If you're unsure, definitely buy a couple of sizes and make sure Amazon is offering FREE RETURNS on those sizes, that's what helped us!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Villegas

customer_reviews.title: This is a great suit. My 4 year old was thrilled to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great suit. My 4 year old was thrilled to have a swimsuit like the lifeguards! Looks so much nicer from the backside than most children's suit. Will purchase again. This is the way to go to the pool! She wears a 6 in.most play clothes, I bought a 5 it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Yard Lady

customer_reviews.title: 3 Strikes and You’re Out
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Speedo Girls Infinity bathing suit that I bought this year. The material in all three wore thin and started to sag after a short time and limited wear. I kept going back to this same suit, because it fit my granddaughter so well. The last one was delivered on December 28th and three months later can't be worn because the material has broken down and is see through. My granddaughter has worn it a total of 15 times for swim lessons that last an hour. As soon as we get home, I hand wash it in the sink and let it air dry. I won't be buying this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Lovestoteach

customer_reviews.title: Awesome suit, but make sure you check the sizing guide!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her rec swimming team. She likes the suit a lot as it looks like a professional's suit and she has not had any issues whatsoever with it riding up. Take care to check the sizing guide in the pictures to make sure you get the right size. The swim suit sizes do not correspond to normal clothing sizes (even if one ignores the fact that clothing sizes are generally not consistent anyways)
customer_reviews.author: Mariperse

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money for the best quality. Great suit!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the suit. Very high quality, nice cut. Her but doesnt ride up at all. She actually told me she swims faster with it on which was adorable. Only problem, shes 8, I bought a 12. It'll fit her for this year, but probably not next year. At $35 a suit, shouldnt a 12 be a little larger on an 8 year old? Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful suit!!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old is in love with this swimsuit! She thinks it’s pretty cool so has a speedo suit like the big girls that race wear! Even with the cutout in the back it covers her really well. There are little soft rubber grips on the inside around the bum to help keep the swimsuit wear it belongs. Mine daughter is pretty petite for her age. She’s almost 5 and still in a lot of 4/4t clothes and we got this suit in a 6. I would recommend going up a size for sure. I think the 6 fits her well because she does have a longer torso.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah GL

customer_reviews.title: Great Speedo quality! Washes well and looks new after MANY uses
customer_reviews.text: Second one of these I have bought my daughter. She loves it! Pros: -comfortable -durable- has been worn many many times at beaches, pools, etc and looks new after months of constant use(each one I’ve purchased) -washes well and it’s been washed after every single use -stays on well with diving, cannonballs, etc and my child feels it covers everything well
customer_reviews.author: R Jung

customer_reviews.title: Size 7 Fits super lean 5 yr old
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 Speedos before we settled on this one. My 5 year old daughter is as tall as a 6-7 year old (about 45”) with the waist of a 3-4 year old (40lb). All the other style Speedos I tried between size 6, 6x and 7 we either too baggy around the chest or groin or too small down the torso. The size 7 speedo in this style covered all the necessary girl parts, even though it still fits a little loose. It was the closest one-piece I could find that fit her so it gets 5 star for that.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye, RD

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We are repeat customers – Speedo never disappoints, and we are pleased with our purchase. The product is durable, excellent quality, affordable and is as described. Every year, when purchasing for the next swim season this is the first thing our kids ask for. They only want to wear these because they are so comfortable, and the coverage is excellent. When the kids are swimming 5-6 times a week competitively, for 1-2 hours a session, they will go through one suit every 5-6 months. So, they stand up pretty well to heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: In my opinion

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo is a size 8 in most things currently, so I bought a size 10 to be safe. Thought it would end up baggy on her, but nope, fits perfectly. She seems to love it and thinks it makes her faster in the water. Who am I to disagree. Seems well made and didn't tear in the rear immediately when she hopped up onto the concrete side of the pool repeatedly (I had this problem with a less expensive suit). I'll be sticking with this brand for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Powers

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, so enjoy it for the month that it lasts.
customer_reviews.text: I found this suit in the store, but not in the size I needed. Ordered it, and it was gorgeous! We got the deep water blue, and it really had the most beautiful (and mesmerizing) deep blue. I was very happy with the suit, and my daughter felt great in it. However, within two months it looked like it had been raked across the coals. The color was gone (it looked sun faded, despite being used exclusively indoors) and the fabric has disintegrated. My daughter swims competitively, and took care of this suit. I have had suits from Walmart last longer than this one did. I had expected better quality from this Speedo suit, and am super sad.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: This suit started to wear thin in just 6 weeks. My kid wears it may 2-3 times per week for maybe an hour. We gently wash it out in the sink. Never wash in the washer or dryer. It is already wearing thin all over that we will have to purchase a new suit. I bought a cheaper version of this suit from Costco and the same thing happened. But now I spent over $30 hoping for a suit to last many months and I am stuck with it. I am disappointed in the quality of speedo suits. Not worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get out of when wet
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter and it felt so nice, she was comfortable and it was more converting than a lot of other swimsuits. She did say it was a bit hard to get into with the way the straps are which makes using the restroom while wet even more challenging but a great quality product. Great design as well.
customer_reviews.author: 1CrazyLife4Me

customer_reviews.title: Poochy crotch, but great value
customer_reviews.text: This suit suffers from a really wrinkly crotch area on my 10yo. Because of the lining my daughter found it very awkward. I am capable of fixing, but beware of this issue. My daughter wears 10 at justice, but 10-12 anywhere else. I ordered a 12 and there is some room to grow. She’s athletic, but not slim. Couldn’t beat the price. The navy/white/aqua colors are very lovely.
customer_reviews.author: J Cassady

customer_reviews.title: No fuss, going to last.
customer_reviews.text: I love Speedo bathing suits for my girls, 10 & 7. They are no fuss and are last all summer- we use them hard (we rotate between a few)! No tops coming off in the waves, no bottoms coming off jumping off docks or going down slides....We are at the beach, pool or lake almost daily during summer. Do note: THESE RUN SMALL SO GO A SIZE UP!
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Awesome swimsuit for girls
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size 12 for my 8 yr old girl since she's tall and about 75 to 80 lbs. This swim wear is beautiful, does not ride up, really good coverage and so comfortable. I got an approval from her Dad to buy more, so bye bye to kiddie swimsuits, we'll be buying speedo from now on =)
customer_reviews.author: Woomy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent suit for kids!
customer_reviews.text: This is a suit for your little ones who desperately want to look like the big kids. Same great quality as all of their suits, with an athletic but appropriate cut for your kid. It wears well, and is long lasting, but I’ve bought two more just because these are so great and I don’t want them to go away.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Stays put on active swimmer.
customer_reviews.text: The best suit, almost identical to what I wore as a kid. Purchased for my daughter in swim lessons after she out grew the same suit in a different color. She likes blue best so I also purchased one size up for her in this color. It is comfortable and stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: AppleDapple

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 in different colors as I thought they would be perfect for my 9 year old daughter to wear to her swim team practices. After no more than 4 wears each displayed horrible discoloration, fraying of material and sagging of elastic on legs. Worthless. VERY disappointed with Speedo. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Tummiolo

customer_reviews.title: Happy costumers!  Love Speedo swimwear!
customer_reviews.text: My child needed a swimsuit for swimming in physical education class at school. This swimsuit has been awesome, and has held up the entire semester! Great value and great price! Very well made! We understand why Speedo products are recommended by so many!
customer_reviews.author: myrtle

customer_reviews.title: Last only 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: It looked good, fitted very well and the price was reasonable but unfortunately it last only for less than 3 months by using it 2 times a week and each time 1 hour! The fabric became something like a mesh and complete see through!!! Cheapest swimsuits last more than this!
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: 7 year old girl approved
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter loves this swimsuit, unfortunately she is in between sizes 10 & 12 so the straps are a little tight on here shoulders, which is ok since we are going to the ocean and need something to keep the sand and shells out.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Too much fabric pilling/fuzz
customer_reviews.text: After one wear only, there was an extreme amount of pilling/fuzz all over, especially in the stomach area. Child didn’t do anything to cause that . Disappointed in Speedo. I have never seen a swimsuit to do this.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great little swimsuit.
customer_reviews.text: I got this swimsuit for a four year old who normally wears a 5 or a 6 in street clothes. Some reviews mentioned that this ran small so I ordered a 7. It fits with a little room to grow this summer. She looks like a teacup Olympian.
customer_reviews.author: KristieLynn

customer_reviews.title: Extremely small.....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a size 14 for my 10 year old which is on the "heavy" side. This swimsuit would not even fit a thin 7-8 year old. It runs EXTREMELY small. I would say a size 14 is more a size 6-7 little girls.
customer_reviews.author: Karlajustme

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable -stays in place
customer_reviews.text: Great looking swim suit! This suit doesn't ride up. The straps don't cut in at the shoulders. This is a quality suit that stays in place while swimming and training. It's not a gimmick. It really works!
customer_reviews.author: TerryTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Speedo school swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a plain navy swimsuit for school but couldn’t find one. My kids have always loved speedo swimwear so it was a no brained to chose this one. It’s within the school guidelines and we know that speedo wears well for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: BAH Walker

customer_reviews.title: Not for tall, thin girls pre-puberty girls...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is 9 and "long and lean". The top of the suit is loose on her, and the back does not lay flat on her back. The legs are ok, but fairly high cut. Does not fit as well as her swim team suits. The quality appears to be good.
customer_reviews.author: dixiedinah

customer_reviews.title: Nice, durable swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this swimsuit to replace the exact same one that my daughter already had. After her wearing it 2x/week for a year, her old one was finally starting to wear. I find that this suit is true to size, and fits her well. She is autistic, and would definitely complain if it didn't lol.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea B.

customer_reviews.title: which is was very nice of them
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased a size 8, given my daughter will turn 8 end of Nov. She's tall and skinny. The suit was big, saggy in the back. Amazon was very prompt with the refund, and we did not have to return the suit, which is was very nice of them, since she'll grow into it at some point. We bought a size 7, and it fit her, she looked nice, but after wearing it to class she said it is a tad snug underarm. I hope it'll loosen a bit with wear. It is nicely made and it stays in place. For reference, my kiddo is 4ft tall and 51 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: dana

customer_reviews.title: Favorite swimsuit brand
customer_reviews.text: Speedo is pure quality! My daughter is on a swim team and no other brand will do. Comfort and quality are a must. The only thing I would mention is that this brand runs small...always order up a size! My daughter is very thin, and always wears smaller sizes, but with speedo we ways buy one size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews I ordered a size up for my average sized 8year old and got a 10. Fits her pretty well but is still on the small side. Definitely order at least one size larger than you normally would. Good quality swim suit though.
customer_reviews.author: K. Easton

customer_reviews.title: Stretched out!
customer_reviews.text: For a speedo suit, I had hoped this would last my daughter 2 seasons. We are only half way through the summer and it is very loose and separated from inner layer. We were sure to rinse the suit after time in the pool, but it is not fitting appropriately and I had to get my daughter a new suit already.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B. Habermehl

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fits right
customer_reviews.text: Just to help with sizing. My Daughter is on the taller size for an 8 year old. She is just barely starting in normal clothing to be a 10/12, but really her 8/10's still fit. We purchased a 12 in this suit and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dadsreview10101

customer_reviews.title: Too small!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just turned 4 but is a little big (tall not fat) for her age so I ordered her a 5.. according to the measurements on Speedo's website that is the correct size for her. It is so small we couldn't even get it on all the way! We will definitely be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Peck

customer_reviews.title: Who knew swimsuits fit this well
customer_reviews.text: Quality. Perfect fit. Looks great. Sporty and fun. My kid looks like a serious swimmer in this suit. So glad I bought this. Saved me hours of running around. Bought another one in next size so I’m ready for a growth spurt. Color looked watermelon pink in photo but ended up being more purple pink in person.
customer_reviews.author: Jf14

customer_reviews.title: Don’t question it...buy it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter isn’t small for 5 so I knew we would have a challenge finding something that fit her. Measurements were pretty right on. Only thing I did notice was the top was slightly big but not enough to return. There is the rubber in the inside of the suit to prevent the suit from riding up.
customer_reviews.author: Christy W

customer_reviews.title: must have for competitive swim practice
customer_reviews.text: durable and thick and perfect for my daughter's swim team practice. A must have for kids who swim more than once a week and swim competitively. My daughter does need help putting it on because the straps cross in the back and so it's hard for her to figure out with help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. It fits perfectly. Exactly her size and comfortable. Does. Ot slip or move as she swims nor does it ride up when she walks. The color combo awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Speedo
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed this swimsuit for swim team. She is very picky about how things feel. She has broad shoulders and a tiny waist. This suit fit very well for her body type. The material is strong and buying it online was so much easier and less expensive. She never complained about comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: good coverage, just a little loose on the hips
customer_reviews.text: Runs small. Bought size 16 for my 12 year old daughter (5'2" /105 pounds). The fit is OK, good coverage, just a little loose on the hips, because she's very slim. After two weeks of daily swim practice, it shows a little bit of wear, but holds better than most brands. No discoloration. The fabric is thick and the front of the swim suit has an inner lining, which is a nice feature. My daughter likes it and found it very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia G.

customer_reviews.title: Color faded in a month and looks so old
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit went bad within a month of use. The color became faded, yarns are coming out. Used to think that speedo is a good brand, but the Justice swimsuit is so much better. Thumbs down to speedo.
customer_reviews.author: Cellophanedreams

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It's not a chlorine proof swimsuit. After a few weeks it's not so colorful anymore. White parts are totally yellow. Very disappointed in Speedo quality. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: G.Black

customer_reviews.title: too big for my niece
customer_reviews.text: I bought a larger size (size 10 for an 8 year old) based on the reviews BUT evidently my niece is skinnier than the other 8 year olds around so it was too big for her. She can use it next year. Thank you, Speedo.
customer_reviews.author: DawnYawn

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart in less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I have now bought this bathing suit 3 times for my swimmer. She's in the pool 4-5 days a week. It's a salt water pool so less chlorine and it falls apart in 2 months ...
customer_reviews.author: Travelin' Mamma

customer_reviews.title: Pilled after 1 wash!
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was a very nice swimsuit however, the stomach is pilling after one wash. I haven't had this issue before.
customer_reviews.author: Ilene

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter complained the back hurts because the back design is too tight. It's the right size though. I will not recommend this style.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Those are great swimsuit. My daughter is in competitive swimming and ...
customer_reviews.text: Those are great swimsuit. My daughter is in competitive swimming and would only wear those for her swim meet. She is 10 years old, about 58 inches and 86 lbs. Even Size 12 is too small for her she needs to wear 14. So definitely buy a size or 2 up.
customer_reviews.author: bearcoca

customer_reviews.title: Swimming wear
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in the swimming club. Need to train every day. So the swimsuit is essential for her. good quality. We buy every quarter
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love Speedo...the quality of its fabric never fails. I know it normally runs a bit small and sized it up to the next and it was just right. Still a little room for my daughter to continue growing into. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Zaydee R.

customer_reviews.title: Best competitive suits with a modest sporty look
customer_reviews.text: We love this style and we have purchased many over the years. Daughter is a competitive swimmer and this suit holds up and it’s age appropriate. It’s a more modest conservative suit.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M.

customer_reviews.title: Swimming with the Grandkids !! Awesome swim suit suits !!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter is on a swim team ! We go through about 6 swim suits a year ! The price is good deal and the swim suit fits true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy B. Corrente

customer_reviews.title: at least she's comfortable. She just used it for a triathlon
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the suit! It's a little weird that she runs around bragging about how she doesn't get wedgies, but hey, at least she's comfortable. She just used it for a triathlon, wearing it under shirts and a shirt for the bike and run portions (3 Mikemile bike and 1 mile run) and she didn't get any rub/irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Tony the Grrreat

customer_reviews.title: Color fades quickly -- BLUE -- quality build but bad color fastness -- not an issue with Pink
customer_reviews.text: The product works and the fabric lasts, but the color blue fades quickly in the pool water. Pink color lasts much longer and wears more evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Joe  Poplicola

customer_reviews.title: Fits long torso nicely
customer_reviews.text: This fits my tall, lean long torso daughter well - we did size up a size from her normal size. Holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: No Name Please

customer_reviews.title: Ran a little large.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the swim team season for my 10 year old girl. It worked fine, although it was slightly too big at the beginning of the season. The leg holes were a little too baggy but she is quite slim. The fabric held up really well wash after wash and it lasted all season which is a plus. I will probably have her wear it this year again because of the size.
customer_reviews.author: R & S

customer_reviews.title: Great suit
customer_reviews.text: My hard to please daughter is happy with this bathing suit, she has a lot of sensory complaints about clothes but has not complaints with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice suit
customer_reviews.text: I have a 6yo daughter (turning 7y next month) and i got size 6 because she is tiny. She wears 6/7 on clothes. And this swim suit fits perfectly but i dont think it will last until next year for she’ll outgrow it.
customer_reviews.author: MsHawaii🌺

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 year old who I have a hard time finding swim suits for, and this fit perfectly. She is comfortable in it. At her size, it is hard to find one that fits that does not have breast cups, but this one worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Tara ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Swimming suit one piece
customer_reviews.text: Love the swimsuit but it frays or disintegrates fast on the behind area. My child swims once a week for an hour and it has not been long to use it. It looks and fits great but color and quality go fast.
customer_reviews.author: Nevena Gluscevic

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect, fabric pilling
customer_reviews.text: The fit was perfect for my daughter, no wedgies at all! But after exactly one use the fabric is Pilling. Expected a little more from Speedo!
customer_reviews.author: hobbeshere

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great swimsuit. We got my daughter her usual size and it fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 15 uses
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter to wear to swim team practice. After 15 one-hour swim sessions, the dark blue material in the back is completely frayed / deteriorated to the point of being see through. I expected much better quality from the Speedo brand. Extremely disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jet Engine Mama

customer_reviews.title: Very small sizes
customer_reviews.text: I bought and had to change for two sizes more than my daughter normally wears, take that detail into account, otherwise good quality and design
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: size is perfect
customer_reviews.text: this is a great package I got and I love it it fits perfectly and as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit
customer_reviews.text: A very good fitting swim suit for my granddaughter. She loves these speedo suits. It is her third one as she is still growing and needs a new one each season. Well made suit
customer_reviews.author: Olivia's Baka

customer_reviews.title: Great Suit!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this suit! She especially loves the "whole in the back" as she calls it! She loves wearing it and has not complained about the fit. It is tight (which is how good swimwear should be). She wears a size 3T and I ordered her a size 4 in this suit and it is working great! It is wonderful Speedo quality and is simply adorable. I highly recommend this suit!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, but I plan for it!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several speedo suits for my granddaughters, and it is always their favorite. I know they run small, but I plan for it, up one size. A very sturdy bathing suit.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce PV

customer_reviews.title: Quality Bathing Suit
customer_reviews.text: Very cute bathing suit. Fits great. Doesn’t ride up. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M Honeycutt

customer_reviews.title: It is a pretty swimming suit
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty swimming suit. I got the size 14 for my 11 yo daughter. She always wears size 14 now, so it fits as I expected. (She is is 80 percentile of weight for her age.) So she is in closer to the upper limit of normal weight for her age. It is lined on the front, not in the back though. And she feels comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DLR

customer_reviews.title: Form and function meet fashion...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first athletic style swim suite we bought for our daughter and we really like how it performs compared to the cute little girl fashion styles we used in the past. The size 5 was a little small so we returned for a size 7. We like it so much, we also bought another color so now she has two.
customer_reviews.author: JPG

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The little girl I bought the bathing suit for... liked it. She goes to swimming classes... The bathing suit works very well!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: I bought it around $~16. Great price. Wait for the prices to go down. Beautiful colors: aqua and purple
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: great bathing suit except for the white color turning yellow
customer_reviews.text: great bathing suit except for the white color (white bands), the white is turning yellow after several uses
customer_reviews.author: JCMJ

customer_reviews.title: Great value, will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: My dtr used it for swimming at the gym. Problem was the chlorine made the white look dingy quick. I would order a darker color next time for pool swimming.
customer_reviews.author: dawn noble

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, runs small
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and stay in place -- no more dealing with material scrunching up in the rear, since they have rubber strips to hold the material in place. ** Runs noticeably small ** We have two daughters who typically wear size 4T / 5T, and had to get them 6T / 7T in these.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Shark Tank ready
customer_reviews.text: Add usual it's Speedo need I say more. If you follow their fitting chart you will never be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: En.N.Kay

customer_reviews.title: Speedo is awesome
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year loves the fit of these suits. Very true to size and fits her thin body.
customer_reviews.author: JPW

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: Great little swimsuit for swim lessons - comfortable, well fitting, good coverage & stays in place!
customer_reviews.author: OS

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 or 2 sizes larger
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter and had to order a few sizes up. She normally wears a size 8 and I ended up with a 12. Ither that that the suit is great. Easy to get on and off and doesn't ride up.
customer_reviews.author: marsha hall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My picky daughter loves this bathing suit! We have continued to purchase the same on for the last 4 years. As she outgrows or wears out one suit we buy the same one (same color etc). I believe the material is top notch and lasts quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and quality. My daughter is 13 and I bought her size 16. It fit her perfectly because she's not thin but not large either, she's in between
customer_reviews.author: Julietin

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: My daughter typically wears XS (5/6) from target and it fits her loose, but we had to order this in 6x for it to fit comfortably on her shoulders and underarm because the elastic would dig in. Once we figured out sizing it worked out. Super great.
customer_reviews.author: Verito

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit! Looks great fits well
customer_reviews.text: Great swimsuit! Looks great fits well. My daughter is on the cusp of the purchased size and next size up. I measured her and some of the measurements were for the next size, while other measurements fit the ordered size. I made the best guesstimate I could and chose to stay safe instead of having a baggy suit. Also, being a swimmer myself I know that the chlorine loosens the fibers over time so, the size stretches out a bit. I would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Daughter likes it
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter uses this for swim practice. The back of the suit doesn't ride up and its easy to get off and on. We recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Practical Mom

customer_reviews.title: Open area lower back
customer_reviews.text: Would give 5 stars but didn't realize this design has an opening at lower back ... still, my fault I guess... and my granddtr is wearing it though she did get sunburned there.
customer_reviews.author: EMB

customer_reviews.title: Bottom becomes see-through after just a few uses
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old daughter has had two of these suits (the black/pink and the blue/white). On both of them the fabric covering her bottom wore through and became translucent after 5-10 uses. We did wash it in the washing machine, but air dried it; I'm not sure if this is what caused the wear. for some reason, the fabric covering the bottom is not lined, while the rest of the suit is. I'm surprised more people haven't commented on this (a few have), but I'm guessing many of the reviews were written soon after receiving the suit and based on the fit rather than the wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Says

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price are good
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 12 year old daughter well, like the color and overall quality. She is happy with this. Seems durable ( being used once a week In swim school ).
customer_reviews.author: Faz

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Size is as it should be. Comfortable suit. No wedgies. Straps don't slide off.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: I gave this a 4 star even though I returned it because it was good quality and cute
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with sizing! I gave this a 4 star even though I returned it because it was good quality and cute. I bought a 12 for my 12 y/o and even though she is of average 12 y/o height and not long in the torso, It was a bit tight. I ordered a 14 of a different Speedo (since they were out of 14's) and it fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Cristine

customer_reviews.title: Quite snug which is good but I'm worried that if it doesn't stretch out ...
customer_reviews.text: Quite snug which is good but I'm worried that if it doesn't stretch out how long she'll be able to use it for. Quality and fit is super should last to be for next child. Fully covers bum.
customer_reviews.author: Damagedfan

customer_reviews.title: Fits right
customer_reviews.text: Bought a size 10 for my almost 8-year-old. She is 4’3 and 60lbs. It fits her just right.
customer_reviews.author: mengdou

customer_reviews.title: Read your care instructions
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to follow the care instructions. Ita a great bathing suit for swimming class but if you do not follow the instruction it will get this faded look fairly quickly (less than 5 washes)
customer_reviews.author: AngelS

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice suit for lessons. However, I would order up one size. It fits at least 1 size smaller than other brands. It is high quality and I would recommend buying it, just up a size.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Modest design and well made suit
customer_reviews.text: The Speedo suit is well-made and has a modest design for pre-teens. The straps were thick and the suit is fully lined inside. Comfortable fit and and great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jen B.

customer_reviews.title: Speedo high quality as always!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 9 year old girl who swims constantly. Always stays put. Always maintains its great color. Third summer in these suits and so glad I found them. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: I like how it stays put on the cheeks to reduce ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made and is holding up quite well with washing and air dry. My daughter is wearing it for her swimming lessons twice a week. I like how it stays put on the cheeks to reduce mishaps.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very Good quality, fits great. My daughter is 9 and very tall (almost 60 inches) and 90lbs. I purchased the size 16. This fits her well and doesn't ride up. Still looks like new!
customer_reviews.author: Jami L. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Speedo rules
customer_reviews.text: Swam for many years in Speedo. Daughter now doing the same. Great fit and cut for my 8 year old
customer_reviews.author: Pat Raring

product_meta.title: Speedo Girl's Swimsuit One Piece Infinity Splice Thick Strap
product_meta.description: When it's time for more coverage without sacrificing quality, you'll want her wearing this durable swimsuit. It's constructed from a special fabric created to keep its shape and color despite a season full of practices and meets. Special performance-enhancing design features a sporty racerback for increased mobility in the water and kid-proof grippers at the leg openings so she can move around comfortably while the suit stays put.
feature_bullets: Durable fabric offers great shape retention
Engineered to have 5 10 times more durability than ordinary spandex fabrics
'No Wedgie'' silicone gripper for stay put coverage
